DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-blind , multicenter , parallel , placebo control study . Approximately 120 eligible patient mild-to-moderate active ulcerative colitis randomize double blind treatment either 1,000 mg twice daily ( b.i.d . ) ASP3291 ( 2,000 mg/d ) match placebo 1:1 ratio 8 week . The study hypothesis treatment ASP3291 compare placebo improve patient 's ulcerative colitis endoscopic score baseline Week 8 .
